title: Chain Reaction
outcome: Daria Tomenko and remaining Innovators activate Halden’s abandoned prediction engine, restoring city order through eerie precision. But the system begins quietly suppressing creativity and unpredictability, forcing citizens to choose between calm and freedom.

events.description: Daria Tomenko and Innovator allies quietly enable the dormant predictive restoration engine, steering BCI to focus on efficiency and social harmony.
Daily life appears to improve dramatically: lines vanish, resource shortages are eased, and even protests quiet as targeted interventions ripple across the city.
Unusual BCI score drops quietly sideline hundreds of artists, dissidents, and eccentric thinkers; citizens start to notice the absence of creative voices.
Daria is confronted by public appeals and a wave of blackout graffiti: 'We will not be erased.' Demands rise for a choice between safety and creativity.
At a mass outdoor debate, the public forces Council members and Innovators to choose: continue the predictive BCI, or restore creative unpredictability, risking instability again.
